alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; Iberville; West Baton Rouge; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 5:11PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Ascension, southeastern West Baton Rouge, southeastern Iberville and south central East Baton Rouge Parishes through 545 PM CDT... At 511 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Plaquemine, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Plaquemine, St. Gabriel, Addis, White Castle, Carville and Geismar. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; Iberville; West Baton Rouge; Western Ascension
